generated_text:
- road: The image shows a wide paved surface with lane markings, clearly designated for vehicle traffic.
- sidewalk: A paved path with a curb separates the road from parked cars and a grassy area, indicating a pedestrian walkway.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible, including a white building on the right and a large office building in the background.
- fence: A metal barrier runs along the left side of the road, separating it from a grassy area and trees.
- pole: Several vertical poles are visible, including one near the sidewalk and others along the fence.
- traffic sign: A vertical sign with text is mounted on a pole near the sidewalk.
- vegetation: Trees are visible along the fence and near the sidewalk.
- terrain: Grass is visible along the sidewalk and in the background.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: Several people are visible walking on the sidewalk near the fence.
- car: Multiple cars are parked along the sidewalk, including a silver car and a red car.
- truck: A yellow truck is visible in the background, parked near the buildings.
